embroidery floss create a y shape on the center of nose piece legs make 4 alike with main color yarn note do not join work in continuous rounds/spiral using stitch markers to mark first stitch of each round round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 4 single_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker total of 4 sts round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each st around total of 8 sts rounds 3 6 1 single_crochet in each st around total 8 sts fasten_off body/head with main color yarn note we are now going to attach the legs to join the legs we use single_crochet if you need help with attaching the legs check out my tutorial link below round 1 chain 4 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook mark first stitch with stitch marker 1 single_crochet in next chain 1 single_crochet in last chain join a leg in the last single_crochet this means that we place 2 single_crochet in the last chain when we join the leg 1 single_crochet around 7 sts top/opening on leg 1 single_crochet next 3 chs the opposite side of the chain join a leg in the center of our work/just before the stitch marker 1 single_crochet around 7 sts top/opening on leg place 1 single_crochet in the same stitch we join the leg join a leg in next st where the stitch marker is/we are now back around 1 single_crochet around 7 sts top/opening on leg place 1 single_crochet in the same stitch we join the leg 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts join the last leg in the same st we just placed the last single_crochet 1 single_crochet around 7 sts top/opening on leg place 1 single_crochet in the same stitch we joined the last leg total of 40 sts note do not join work in continuous rounds/spiral using stitch markers to mark first stitch of each round rounds 2 12 1 single_crochet in each st around
